data.title: Death rate by age and sex in the U.S. 2020
data.meta_description: In the United States in 2020, the death rate was highest among those aged 85 and over, with about 16,354.9 men and 14,560 women per 100,000 of the population passing away.
data.text:

Supplementary notes

Death rate covers the number of deaths per 100,000 of population.

* Figures for age not stated are included in "All ages" but are not distributed among age group. ** Death rates for "Under 1 year" (based on population estimates) differ from infant mortality rates (based on live births).
